scripts.test: npm run auto-tests && npm run solium
scripts.auto-tests: rm -rf build;npm run remove-zos-dev; npm run truffle-compile && scripts/test.sh
scripts.migrate-qa-standalone: npm run remove-zos-dev; truffle migrate --network qaStandalone
scripts.migrate-qa-testnet: npm run remove-zos-dev; truffle migrate --network qaTestnet
scripts.migrate-testnet: npm run remove-zos-dev; truffle migrate --network rskTestnet
scripts.deploy-reset-dev: npm run remove-zos-dev; rm -r build/contracts; truffle migrate --network development --reset
scripts.deploy-reset-testnet: npm run remove-zos-dev; rm -r build/contracts; truffle migrate --network rskTestnet --reset
scripts.deploy-reset-qa-standalone: npm run remove-zos-dev; rm -r build/contracts; truffle migrate --network qaStandalone --reset
scripts.deploy-reset-qa-testnet: npm run remove-zos-dev; rm -r build/contracts; truffle migrate --network qaTestnet --reset
